local_intent: Execute the pick of the white_plate using the computed grasp, verify grasp stability and object in gripper; retry pick once on failure.
assumptions: A valid grasp key 'white_plate_grasp' is available on the blackboard
Gripper is open and positioned above the white plate from prior steps
Perception can confirm visibility before final approach
coherence_with_global: Performs the Pick phase from the global plan: verifies visibility, approaches/alignment, performs Pick, and verifies stable grasp and object presence; includes a bounded retry to match failure-and-recovery guidance.
